original_title: Sri Lanka Insurance emerged winners at the ‘Great HR Quiz 2023’
original_body_lines: The HR team of Sri Lanka Insurance recently emerged winners at the Great HR Quiz 2023 in the Insurance, Finance and Investment category. The SLIC HR team was also able to secure an impressive 4th place overall out of the 65 companies participated at the quiz.

The Great HR Quiz 2023 was organized by the Chartered Institute of Personnel Management (CIPM). It is the only quiz dedicated to HRM fraternity to uplift the knowledge and capacity of human resources professionals in Sri Lanka and the quiz covers all aspects of HR and general knowledge of participants.
